function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of virus transmission via sewage due to human feces contamination in wastewater","Impact":"Spread of the virus through sewage could lead to widespread contamination and potential exposure to the virus","Mitigation":"Implement proper wastewater management measures to avoid the spread of the virus via wastewater","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, ultraviolet disinfection, and virus detection sensors","People":"Public, sanitation workers, wastewater treatment personnel","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Changes in housing layout and design leading to potential lack of privacy and overcrowding","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining private spaces during lockdown could lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within households","Mitigation":"Design and promote house layouts that prioritize privacy, personal spaces, and isolation for each family member","Technologies":"Smart home automation, room partitioning systems, and ergonomic furniture design","People":"Household residents","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, and homeowners"},{"Description":"Selection of indoor finishing materials impacting virus lifetimes on surfaces","Impact":"Improper selection of materials may lead to higher virus survival and transmission within the built environment","Mitigation":"Choose antimicrobial materials with shorter virus lifetimes, such as copper, cardboard, and specific ceramic-quartz and Alumina Trihydrate composites","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surface coatings, copper-based surfaces, and antimicrobial composite materials","People":"Building occupants, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Property developers, building contractors, interior designers"}]}
